summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Lee Street, from Highland Place to 4th Avenue North; 3rd Avenue North from the north line of Woodward's Addition to the City of Seattle, to Galer Street; Nob Hill Avenue, from Lee Street to Galer Street; 4th Avenue North from Lee Street to Galer Street; all in the City of Seattle by grading, curbing and sidewalking the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 195 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
